fig, ax = plt.subplots(1, 2)
test_map.visualizeComponents(fig, ax, components='EE,BB', region=(200, 
    20000, -20000, 20000))
fig.tight_layout()
test_map.savefig('auto.png')
fig, ax = plt.subplots()
test_map.visualizeComponents(fig, ax, components='EB', region=(200, 20000, 
    -20000, 20000))
fig.tight_layout()
test_map.savefig('cross.png')
